simplesect.title: uint16_t SPI_BaudRatePrescaler
simplesect.para:
Specifies the Baud Rate prescaler value which will be used to configure the transmit and receive SCK clock. This parameter can be a value of SPI_BaudRate_Prescaler Note:
The communication clock is derived from the master clock. The slave clock does not need to be set.
